channel.title: PROJECTS on Adithya's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in PROJECTS on Adithya's Portfolio

item.title: Scene To Text Detection and Pronounciation
item.description: Project Details Scene texts contain rich semantic information which may be used in many vision-based applications, consequently detecting and recognizing scene texts have received increasing attention in recent years.

item.title: Bike Price Prediction
item.description: Project Details In the first step we have collected the dataset and it is converted to csv format after that several data pre-processing and modification steps like Managing Categorical attributes, Taking care of missing data for further implementation After implementation of several machine learning algorithms, we have finalized Decision Tree Regressor from sklearn library of python for our project with an accuracy of 99.

item.title: Face Expression detection
item.description: Project Details This project deals with the detection of the emotion on the face with the help of the camera.
